ovdesc.p: This Table is maintained by the system with all the items (records) created in a project using AA Product Builder.

It has details like, application name, record key, company id for the record created. These details are also updated in another live table EB.PROJECT.DETAILS in a different format, where these details are held by Application/recordkey with the projects which are using these records

desc.p: Holds the override messages encountered when the project is committed, i.e. when all the records in the project are authorised
"Describes the name of the application name of the record which is already added to the project
Associated multi-value fields between APPLICATION and RECORD.KEY fields"
Describes the company code of the record which is already added to the project
Describes the record id of the record which is alread added to the project
Describes the project id, allowed format is PRJDDDDDXXXXXXX, DDDDD - is the current julian date of the system and XXXXXXX is the auto-generated unique sequence number for the current system date
Describes the type of project, currently only supports AA, which means created within AA Product Builder
Describes the record id of the record which is amended in the project
"Describes the USER who created the project
System maintained field"
"Describes the current action performed on the project,
ADD - Amended recrods to the project, ie either added or deleted to the project
DELETE - Entire project to be deleted
COMMIT - Authorise the records that are in the project and are in held status
ARCHIVE - Archive the project"
"Describes the name of the application name of the record which is currently being added to the project
Associated multi-value fields between APPLICATION and RECORD.KEY fields"
Describes the company code of the record which is currently being amended in the project
"Describes the project creation date
System maintained"
Describes the project details and is used for enrichment. Product Builder uses the description captured to update the description for the specified language
Provides more detailed description of the project
Describes the T24 function of the record which is currently being amended in the project, could be either I - input or D - delete
"Describes the date on which the project was last updated
System maintained"
"Holds the error messages encountered when the project is committed, i.e. when all the records in the project are authorised
Either will have dependency errors or incorrect record details for the application"
